item.title: Contact
item.description:
Get In Touch

I’m always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or just chatting about technology.

Contact Information

  • Email: jamie.dean@example.com
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/jamiedean
  • GitHub: github.com/jamiedean
  • Location: United Kingdom

Feel free to reach out!

item.title: Experience
item.description:
Professional Experience

Current Role: NovaraPro (SaaS Wholesale Bakery Management System)

  • Technologies: Next.js, CI/CD, PostgreSQL, LLM, Docker/Podman Images, Unit Testing, Smoke Testing, System Testing, Integration Testing, Git Actions
  • Description: Developing a multi-tenant, pay-as-you-go services platform for wholesale bakery management. Focused on scalable architecture, automated testing, and deployment pipelines.

Software Placement: Secure Innovation

  • Description: Gained hands-on experience in secure software development practices, contributing to projects emphasizing security and innovation.

University of Plymouth

  • Description: Pursuing a degree in Software Engineering, with coursework covering advanced topics in development, testing, and project management.

Open-Source Contributions

  • Projects: Contributed to resegva, NovaraPro, Westcountry Bakery
  • Description: Active in open-source communities, improving code quality and collaborating on diverse projects.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Key Projects

NovaraPro

  • Description: A multi-tenant SaaS platform for wholesale bakery management. Built with Next.js, featuring CI/CD pipelines, PostgreSQL database, LLM integration, and comprehensive testing suites.
  • Technologies: Next.js, PostgreSQL, Docker, GitHub Actions, LLM
  • Status: Ongoing development
